# Data Loads
```{r}
rawnav_decomp_all <- 
  load_rawnav(
    file.path(path_data,"test_decomp_mov11_all.csv")
  ) %>%
  cleanup_things()

```

# combindation cases

Are there cases where a bus stops before the signal, then edges into the stop area to serve passengers?

```{r}
  rawnav_combo <-
  rawnav_decomp_all %>%
  group_by(filename,index_run_start) %>%
  mutate(
    has_double_stop =
      if_else(
        is_stopped
      )
  )
```
